administration, possibly replacing Robert Gates as defense secretary, Colin Powell said he is not interested in a government role. He said he wants to remain in private life although he is happy to be an informal presidential adviser. The administration knows that I am quite content with the work I am doing now, he said.`` I am not interested in a government job.''
